paragraphs.1: In operative paragraph 64, after “to strengthen their efforts in preventing” insert “and combating child pornography”.
paragraphs.2: In operative paragraph 65, after “once in force” insert “, and emphasizes that the new convention must be implemented in a way that does not undermine the obligations of States contained in the Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of the Child on the sale of children, child prostitution and child pornography”.
